tags: if you see it that way
summary:
Steve: [after trying to entertain a baby with a bear costume for charity] I thought I heard you guys out here.
Tony: Steve? Is...
body:
Steve: [after trying to entertain a baby with a bear costume for charity] I thought I heard you guys out here.

Tony: Steve? Is that you in there?

Steve: Yeah. It’s me…

Tony: Oh my god, the bear ate Steve. Bad bear!

[shoots a bolt of energy into Steve making him go flying]

Steve: Ahhh! Never do that again!

Tony: You’re not the boss of me. [fires a blast again]

blog.name: tonystarkfandom3000
blog.title: Tony:MyHero3000
blog.description: So, if you like Tony Stark like I do, chances are you got traumatized by Endgame. This is a blog dedicated solely to him. Basically, a memorial because no one can possibly be allowed to forget him and because we all need therapy... Submissions and asks and whatever are always open. Target: REMEMBER Tony Stark a ridiculous much every day. Follow for more!

summary: Can we have a prequel series kinda thingie centered around Tony, Pepper, and Morgan living in that adorable, cozy cabin...
body:
Can we have a prequel series kinda thingie centered around Tony, Pepper, and Morgan living in that adorable, cozy cabin before… Stuff happened?

Like imagine a whole show dedicated to basking in how much of an epic father Tony Stark is!!!

I am also a...

summary:
I can’t stop imagining the song “Barbies” by P!nk for Morgan Stark...  

🎶They say that things were simple then, Although I...
body:
I can’t stop imagining the song “Barbies” by P!nk for Morgan Stark… 

🎶They say that things were simple then,
Although I don’t remember when,
I wanna know what happens next,
Where do we all go?🎶

🎶Oh I wish I could go back to playing Barbies in my room.
They never say that you gotta grow up quite this soon.
How fast things change,
and now I’m here.
And all I wanna do Is go back to playing Barbies in my room.🎶

🎶Back to playing barbies uh,
I wish that I could go back,
I wish that I could go back,
I wish that I could go back,
Back to playing barbies in my room.🎶

summary:

Stephen: What’s wrong?
Tony: You haven’t looked at me for ten minutes.

body:
Tony: *sighs dramatically*
Stephen: What’s wrong?
Tony: You haven’t looked at me for ten minutes.
Stephen: We’re watching a movie.
Tony: Did I ask for an excuse?

dialogue.name: Tony

dialogue.name: Tony

dialogue.phrase: Did I ask for an excuse?

blog.name: iliveamystery
blog.title: Broken but Beautiful
blog.description: 31 female

summary: I don’t know if this has been said but the moment when nebula finds tony unconscious with the iron man helmet laying close...
body:
I don’t know if this has been said but the moment when nebula finds tony unconscious with the iron man helmet laying close beside him is some beautiful cinematography. Tony, as malnourished as he is, looks peaceful. Having made his peace with everything and Nebula putting him in the captain’s chair. Literally a place of honor for a man she’s come to admire and esteem. It’s a seat of dignity instead of laying down on a small shelf. and I’ll always love the gentle shoulder touch she gives him at the end.  

@tonystark5ever @keep-a-bucket-full-of-stars

summary: A Simple Favor | Starker
title: A Simple Favor | Starker
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VZghdx

by thelosthours

Peter Parker, a lonely suburban dad and blogger who embarks on a sort-of friendship with another mom: glamorous, mysterious Pepper Potts. When Pepper disappears, Peter begins to unravel a web of suspicion and secrets around Pepper, her husband Tony Stark, and their perfect facade.

summary: Rebirth of Iron Man
title: Rebirth of Iron Man
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HcA7Zi

by Tantei_Otaku_Kun

ENDGAME SPOILERS!
YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
.
.
.
.
.

“I am inevitable.“

"I am…I am Iron Man.”

And then SNAP!

After the snap of his life, he look at his woman of his life who told him to take rest…So he did…He died peacefully.

But then…Tony awaken in his grave and found out that he have been dead for ten years. But the question is…Who revive him? For what purpose?

Words: 394, Chapters: 1/15, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe), Peter Parker, Steve Rogers, Avengers Team
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & World, Tony Stark & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie), I don’t know how to do tags, So sue me, basically Tony is dead, And the world is forever fucked, Okay just kidding, This Is Sad, Love you 3000, Not Beta Read, So my grammar will suck, Don’t Judge Me, or this story might be remove for good, I’m done with people that’s always harassed me for my weak grammar, so I will show them who is the best, OH BY THE WAY, spiderson, Irondad, Jarvis (Iron Man movies) Lives, endgame spoilers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HcA7Zi

by Tantei_Otaku_Kun

ENDGAME SPOILERS!
YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
.
.
.
.
.

“I am inevitable.“

"I am…I am Iron Man.”

And then SNAP!

After the snap of his life, he look at his woman of his life who told him to take rest…So he did…He died peacefully.

But then…Tony awaken in his grave and found out that he have been dead for ten years. But the question is…Who revive him? For what purpose?

body:
harley: sorry :(

tony: are you? are you sorry?

harley: :(

tony: its ok


tony: whats his name?

harley: who?

tony: the kid who bullies you, whats his name? *gives him a thing to deal with the bully*

blog.name: judaiteitoreokou
blog.title: JudaiTeito
blog.description:
"The 'me' you’d wanted to see is long gone, even as you drown yourself in an unsightly lust."
Ships HajiShun, ShikiTsuba and KouMamo. Your daily dose of Tsukiuta/Tsukipro headcanons, AUs, arts and fics. Also ships SoraMori, ShuEi, ShinKai, KuroMahi, TsubaSaku, YouYoru, AraAoi, etc.

tags: but they also appreciate each other a lot
encourage the other when they're feeling down
im still not over the endgame
summary: Rewatching Avengers Assemble (my way of coping up with Endgame)  1x13
title: Rewatching Avengers Assemble (my way of coping up with Endgame)  1x13
body:
Tony: Even without your shield, you're still Captain America. Without my armor I'm just...
Steve: You're Tony Stark. THE Tony Stark. Billionaire. Genius. You're probably one of the three smartest men in the whole world.
Steve: You're as tough as they come. You invented hardcore. 
Steve: The Avengers are lucky you're on our side.
Tony: Really? You know two people smarter than me?
Steve: Can't you just take a compliment?

blog.name: askyourfavouriteotp
blog.title: Ask your OTP
blog.description:
This an ask blog where you can ask

WinterFalcon / Merthur / Spideypool /
ScarletVision / Matt x Foggy x Karen

whatever you wanna know!

Gifs are a mix of things found on the web and our own gifs, feel free to use them!

Please be respectful both to the ship and person answering while sending in your question

SCHEDULE
Monday - WinterFalcon (Marvel) questions answered by roshytsunami
Tuesday - Merthur (BBC) questions answered by rainbowanimation
Wednesday - Spideypool (Marvel) questions answered by nerdofthefreeeeandfandoms
Thursday - ScarletVision (Marvel) questions answered by jennareedus
Friday - Matt x Foggy x Karen (Daredevil) questions answered by nerdofthefreeeeandfandoms
Weekend - mod asks, sometimes some RPs and time for us to answer questions

Spideypool photo manip in the main photo by queensofwd, used with permission

tags: stony is back for one day v 3
summary: . “She is a little sweetheart for sure.”  *Steve holds Robbie* “Robbie is my favorite girl and Chris is my favorite boy. Right,...
body:
.

“She is a little sweetheart for sure.”

*Steve holds Robbie* “Robbie is my favorite girl and Chris is my favorite boy. Right, Princess?”

“Hey, so what that makes me?”

“You are my favorite mommy.”

“… That sounded wrong on so many levels, Steve.”
